name: Treeker: The Lost Glasses
description: Treeker: The Lost Glasses is a first-person adventure game, with puzzle and platform elements. Use the lens to advance in the game, and discover the secrets of these forgotten islands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9500GT / AMD Radeon HD 5570 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Albeit a beautiful game, I often find myself getting lost.   The game is amazing. The visuals and the colour palette are so vivid and well done that it really makes you feel like your in the game. But as for the gameplay, it seems lacking in that department. The game feels like it was all threw together, but it works. It's so hard to explain so let me try to summarize it for you..  -Good visuals -Bad layout.  I'm torn about this game, but it still gets a thumbs-up from me. Do give it a go!
